invalid-password: Password doesn't meet all the requirements.
page-not-found: Hmmm. The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
error.banned-description-1: Your account has been suspended due to violation of our community standards.
tags-title-description: A tag is a keyword or label that categorizes your question with other, similar questions. Using the right tags makes it easier for others to find and answer your question.
question-title-description: Summarize your problem clearly and briefly.
question-title-placeholder: Choose a title for your question
question-detail-description: Include all the information someone would need to answer your question.
add-image: Browse images or drag and drop here.
image-upload-limit: You can upload at most {{maxImages}} images.
tag-description: Tags help others find your question easily. Choose at least one tag and up to five.

question-title.question: How do I write a good question title?
answers: Avoid vague titles like "Help! My code doesn't work!"

question-tags.question: How do I choose the right tags?
answers: Tags help categorize your question so others can find it.
Use relevant programming languages (e.g., python, reactjs).
Avoid broad or unrelated tags (e.g., help, beginner).

question-details.question: What details should I include in my question?
answers: A clear explanation of the problem.
A minimal reproducible example (code + steps to reproduce).
Any relevant error messages (as text, not screenshots).

question-images.question: Can I include images in my question?
answers: Yes, but only when necessary (e.g., complex error messages or UI issues).
Avoid using images for code. Always paste code as text in the question detail section.
Use the image upload button to add an image directly.

question-after-posting.question: What should I do after posting my question?
answers: Check for answersâ€”someone might ask for clarification.
Edit your question if needed (add details, fix formatting).
Accept the best answer once your issue is solved.
If you find a solution on your own, post it as an answer to help others.

questionForm.emptyTitle: Question title must not be blank.
questionForm.noTags: You need to choose at least 1 tag for your question.
questionForm.maxTags: You can only choose at most 5 tags. Remove a tag to add another.
